name: GitWars
description:
Hi everyone !

GitWars is our game made at the Upsijam.2.0. gamejam.

Your coworker or you will have to manage git merge conflicts.
Who will stay overnight to deal with it ? Let's play GitWar to find out !




Made with Godot Engine and git et beaucoup de café caramel gratuits ;)

Assets, sound effects have been made by us.
Exceptions : 

[Music Assets] FREE Music Loop Bundle by Tallbeard Studios
VHS and CRT monitor effect - Godot Shaders
FREE Action Music Pack by VOiD1 Gaming

Thank you Linus.

Team: znichola | werterhalimi | 0xOnyx | Elwoll
